Message: The user completes the submission of the form
Why has my ad not been approved?

If your ad hasn't been approved, it might be due to verification issues or specific ad content not aligning with NewsBreak's policies. If your account is new and hasn't been verified, please provide the following details by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification –
- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
Once we receive this information, we'll conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status. For more details on ad rejection reasons and how to address them, you can check out this article: [My ad got rejected. What's next?](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18085960681101-My-ad-got-rejected-What-s-next).
